column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I came here with my family (a party of 20+) on my birthday
column2: and HUGE props to our waitress for being super patient with us. We started off with the Malnati salad
column3: which was so delicious. I particularly enjoyed the combination of the mushrooms
column6: and the sweet vinaigrette dressing. Other appetizers we got were the combination platter (mozzarella sticks
column10: and the stuffed spinach bread. All of these were cheesy and filling
column12: I wish we didn't go so overboard because we underestimated our main course.
